projectPlannersDescription: Our team comprises top experts and professionals in the industry, including a team of gold medal lawyers, experienced education experts, and language trainers. We are dedicated to providing customized education and immigration solutions to ensure that every student and client has the best experience in their studies and life in Canada.

Chairman of Montreal International Education Center
Chairman of the Board of Directors of United Universities of Canada
Deputy Director of the Canadian International Education Bureau
Chairman of the French International Education Federation (Canada)

Director of the Board of Montreal International Education Center

teamMembers.name: Brock Zhao
teamMembers.description: CEO of Montreal International Education Center

teamSubtitle: We bring together top experts in the industry, including a team of lawyers, education experts, certified immigration consultants, and French language instructors

sections.title: Expert Advisors
sections.description: Our expert advisory team consists of renowned scholars and industry elites from home and abroad. They have a deep background and rich practical experience in education management, economic research, and industry-education integration. Through the guidance and consultation of these experts, the Montreal International Education Center is committed to providing you with cutting-edge educational concepts and the most effective immigration solutions, helping you realize your study and immigration dreams.

sections.title: Admissions Team
sections.description: Led by the experienced admissions director, Tony Liu, our admissions team is dedicated to providing personalized education consulting and enrollment support to every student.

sections.title: Lecturer Team
sections.description: We have a team of highly experienced and accomplished education experts. Our team members not only have a solid academic background but also rich practical experience, providing students with unique insights and high-quality teaching.

sections.title: Legal Department
sections.description: Our legal team has extensive experience and a deep background in international relations and immigration law. They are committed to providing professional legal guidance and support to clients, including but not limited to handling deportation orders, extradition requests, and spousal sponsorship appeals.

sections.title: China Team
sections.description: Our operations in China are led by a passionate and experienced team. They understand the unique needs of the Chinese market and are committed to providing excellent study abroad application guidance and immigration services to Chinese students while actively expanding business cooperation and exploring diverse development opportunities.

sections.title: Marketing Department
sections.description: Our marketing department is dedicated to promoting the brand philosophy of the Montreal International Education Center. Through multi-channel marketing strategies, we enhance brand awareness and influence. We use innovative and precise data analysis to provide clients with the latest education and immigration information, ensuring that every client receives the information they need in a timely manner.

sections.title: Market Department
sections.description: The market department focuses on exploring new market opportunities, analyzing market needs and trends, and formulating competitive market strategies. Our team not only pays attention to current market dynamics but also focuses on future development. Through continuous market research and customer feedback, we ensure that our services are always at the forefront of the industry.

sections.title: Language Center
sections.description: Our language center offers a one-stop service from exams to language courses, helping students confidently communicate in different language environments. Through flexible teaching methods and advanced teaching resources, we provide students with an efficient and practical language learning experience, enabling them to achieve better results.

sections.title: Administration Office
sections.description: The administration office is the hub of the company's operations, responsible for coordinating the work of various departments and ensuring smooth daily operations. Our team is efficient and professional, dedicated to providing employees with a good working environment and comprehensive logistical support, ensuring that all business operations proceed orderly.

sections.title: Finance Department
sections.description: The finance department is responsible for the financial management and supervision of the Montreal International Education Center, ensuring the rational use of funds and transparent financial status. Our finance team is proficient in various financial operations and legal regulations, safeguarding the company's steady development.
